Major_Arcs.title: Introduction to The Human Meteor
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the comic and the main character, Human Meteor, setting the stage for the first adventure.

sub_scenes.title: Comic Book Cover Introduction
sub_scenes.description: The cover page of the comic introduces the title, main character, premise, and hints at the initial conflict.

Major_Arcs.title: The Undersea Terror Investigation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Duke O'Dowd as he juggles his taxi driver job and his secret identity as Human Meteor, leading him to investigate a suspicious undersea threat.

sub_scenes.title: Duke's Day Begins and Suspicion Arises
sub_scenes.description: Duke starts his day as a taxi driver, encounters suspicious passengers and observes G-Man Holden, sparking his superhero instincts.

sub_scenes.title: Human Meteor Investigates and Infiltrates
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor confronts criminals, receives a mission briefing from G-Man Holden, and plans an infiltration of a suspicious yacht with Toby.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Investigation and Twist
sub_scenes.description: Duke investigates the yacht cabin, Toby is discovered and thrown overboard, revealing a twist about Toby's true allegiance and the yacht's mission.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke's Rescue and Yacht's True Mission

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Investigation and Submarine Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Duke dives underwater, discovers a sunken Japanese submarine and witnesses the ongoing resupply operation.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Combat
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor engages in underwater combat with divers and encounters a new diver and a tentacle attack.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with New Diver and Tentacle Attack

sub_scenes.title: Attacks and Shipboard Events
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor attacks the submarine with a torpedo, shifts target to the yacht, and resurfaces, while a mysterious incident occurs on a nearby ship.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke Targets the Ship and Needs Air

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Duke surfaces, finds evidence on the yacht, meets with authorities, and concludes the day with Toby and Holden, resolving the immediate undersea threat.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery on the Yacht and Map Revelation

Major_Arcs.title: The Liberty Lads and the Nazi Spy Ring
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Skip and Chuck, two boys who stumble upon a Nazi spy ring and become involved in uncovering their sabotage plans.

sub_scenes.title: Boys Observe Ambulance
sub_scenes.description: An imagined dramatic scene of Nazi fiends is quickly juxtaposed with the reality of two boys, Skip and Chuck, witnessing an ambulance arrival, starting their unexpected adventure.

sub_scenes.title: Wallet Discovery and Marine Encounter
sub_scenes.description: The boys find a dropped wallet leading them to the bus garage and encounter a marine saluting a civilian, adding to the mystery.

narrative_arcs.title: Ambulance Interne Drops Wallet and Boys Investigate
Marine Salutes Civilian and Boys Inquire

sub_scenes.title: Arrival at Bus Garage and Meeting Mr. Horst
sub_scenes.description: The boys arrive at the bus garage to return the wallet and are led to the intimidating Mr. Horst, escalating the situation.

narrative_arcs.title: Boys Arrive at Bus Garage and Encounter Uniformed Man
Boys Led to Mr. Horst and Instructed to Wait
Sudden Grab and Confrontation with Mr. Horst

sub_scenes.title: Horst's Interrogation and Sinister Plan
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Horst interrogates the boys about the wallet, while a sinister plan involving carbon monoxide is discussed among other figures, revealing the danger.

narrative_arcs.title: Horst Questions Boys About Wallet Contents
Accusation of Lying in Another Room

sub_scenes.title: Garage Fight and Bronson's Downfall
sub_scenes.description: A fight breaks out in the garage, the boys are overpowered, threatened, and Major Bronson is unexpectedly shot by Horst, turning the tide of the conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Fight Breaks Out and Order to Stop
Man with Glasses Threatens Boys with Gun

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Help and Sabotage Discovery
sub_scenes.description: The boys decide to seek help, Chuck encounters a Marine Sergeant, while Skip discovers sabotage plans in a secret office, uncovering the larger conspiracy.

narrative_arcs.title: Skip Discovers Sabotage Plans and Confrontation

sub_scenes.title: Marines Alerted and Skip Under Attack
sub_scenes.description: Marines are alerted to Major Bronson's danger, while Skip is attacked and confronted by armed men, escalating the immediate threat.

narrative_arcs.title: Skip's Book Defense and Gun Confrontation

sub_scenes.title: Marines Intervene and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Marines arrive and intervene in the fight, dealing with the Nazi spy ring, though Major Bronson is injured, leading to a successful resolution.

Major_Arcs.title: Champ and Henry in South America
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Champ and Henry and their adventure in South America, where they get entangled in a kidnapping case.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Champ and Initial Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Champ and Henry and their setting in South America, where their presence is noted by local authorities leading to an initial confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Henry

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Kidnapping Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry are interrogated by officers, leading to the revelation of President Rosita's daughter's kidnapping by El Tigre.

narrative_arcs.title: Interrogation and Revelation of Rosita's Kidnapping

sub_scenes.title: Abduction and New Alliance
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry are abducted but find themselves allied with the mother of Rosita's daughter, setting them on a rescue mission.

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration of El Tigre's Hideout
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry plan and execute an infiltration of El Tigre's hideout using a distraction tactic, leading to a confrontation and the reveal of El Tigre.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning the Infiltration of El Tigre's Hideout

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre and the Search for Rosita
sub_scenes.description: The search for Rosita intensifies, El Tigre is interrogated and denies involvement, revealing the involvement of Axis agents using his name.

narrative_arcs.title: El Tigre's Weariness and Cryptic Thought
Searching for Rosita and Threatening El Tigre
Interrogation about Rosita and Denial of Kidnapping

sub_scenes.title: Planning and Resolve to Rescue Rosita
sub_scenes.description: Questions arise about Tigre's actions, leading to news of Rosita's imprisonment and a determined resolve to launch a rescue operation.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Explanation Regarding Tigre's Actions
Urgent Call to Action and Pursuit
Determined Resolve to Rescue Rosita at Any Cost

sub_scenes.title: Pursuit and Rescue of Rosita
sub_scenes.description: A horseback pursuit ensues, leading to strategic infiltration and agile maneuvering, culminating in the discovery of Rosita and immediate hostile confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Rosita and Immediate Hostility

sub_scenes.title: Combat and Aftermath of Rosita's Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Aggressive combat erupts, including a machine gun threat, leading to heroic intervention and government troops' arrival, securing Rosita's rescue and its immediate aftermath.

narrative_arcs.title: Machine Gun Threat and Heroic Intervention
Government Troops and Search for Fascists

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan's Jungle Mission
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Devil Dog Dolan on a jungle mission, characterized by combat, capture, torture, and eventual defiance.

sub_scenes.title: Devil Dog Dolan's Jungle Mission Begins
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan engages in jungle combat and then reports to Captain Lawton, initiating his specific mission despite disobedience.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Pursuit and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Pursuit into the jungle river leads to a trek and an unexpected ambush by native warriors.

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Capture and Torture
sub_scenes.description: Dolan is captured, interrogated, and subjected to torture to extract information about sub detector plans.

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Arson and Reactions
sub_scenes.description: Dolan admits to actions and sets fire to supplies, triggering reactions from a fellow marine and the enemy forces.

narrative_arcs.title: Dolan Admits and Acts to Burn Supplies

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Fight with Natives and its Consequences
sub_scenes.description: Dolan engages in a surprise attack against natives, leading to the chief's death, Grauer's departure, and a shift in native allegiance.

narrative_arcs.title: Dolan's Surprise Attack and Fight with Natives
Natives' Homage and Gratitude to Marine

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Action and Service Discipline
sub_scenes.description: The Captain faces a dilemma, intervenes in a confrontation, leading to an 'American Justice Fight' and subsequent service discipline and reflection.

narrative_arcs.title: Shore Leave Rescinded and Dolan's Praise

Major_Arcs.title: The Twinkle Twins and the Burgess Murder Case
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins and their investigation into the murder of banker Robert Burgess, tackling racketeering and community support.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Twinkle Twins
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins and the premise of their stories, setting them up as protectors of ordinary people against ruthless killers.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Twinkle Twins and their mission

sub_scenes.title: Initial Investigation into Burgess Murder
sub_scenes.description: The Twinkle Twins are briefed on the Burgess murder case and begin their investigation at the newspaper office, police station, and hospital.

narrative_arcs.title: Newspaper Office Briefing on Burgess Murder
Hospital Visit and Discovery of Miss Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Developing Suspicions and Radio Revelation
sub_scenes.description: The Twins form suspicions about racketeering, contact Elijah, and a radio broadcast reveals crucial connections, directing their investigation towards Tom Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Candy Store Phone Inquiry to Elijah
Radio Broadcast Revelation and Reilly Pursuit

sub_scenes.title: Irish Section Inquiry and Gunfire
sub_scenes.description: Inquiries in the Irish section lead to Mrs. Murphy's explanation of Reilly's situation, followed by sudden gunfire and Reilly's escape attempt.

narrative_arcs.title: Mrs. Murphy's Explanation of Tom Reilly's Situation

sub_scenes.title: Car Chase and Citizen Resolution
sub_scenes.description: A car chase ensues, halted by a citizen blockade, leading to a citizen uprising and police intervention, resolving the immediate criminal threat.

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Blood Transfusion Challenge
sub_scenes.description: Police assess the crime scene, the Twins rush to the shooting scene, arrive at the hospital, and face the challenge of a blood type mismatch for Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Arrival and Blood Transfusion Need
Blood Type Mismatch and Community Aid

sub_scenes.title: Community Blood Donation and Reilly's Recovery
sub_scenes.description: An urgent call for blood donors leads to a community response, anxious wait, blood type confirmation, transfusion preparation, donation, and finally, Reilly's recovery.

narrative_arcs.title: Community Responds to Blood Donation Call

sub_scenes.title: Farnacci's Arrest and Celebration of Recovery
sub_scenes.description: The story concludes with plans to arrest Farnacci, his defiant arrest in a pool room, and a celebration of Reilly's daughter's recovery, marking a happy ending.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Farnacci to Donate Blood and Police Action Plan
Police Confrontation and Arrest of Farnacci
Celebration of Reilly's Daughter's Recovery and Farnacci's Imprisonment
